BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISSRT_REP_MNT_LT_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_APPLICATION_NO, DT_DATE_OF_RECEIVING, STR_NAME_OF_COMPLAINER, STR_DETAILS_TO_BE, DT_FAULT_FOUND_ON, STR_WHET_PRIMARY_COMP, STR_REF_PRIMARY_APP_NO, DT_OF_FORW_TO_HE_ELEC, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISSRT_REP_MNT_LT_TRN SET DT_DATE_OF_RECEIVING=?, STR_DETAILS_TO_BE=?, DT_FAULT_FOUND_ON=?, STR_WHET_PRIMARY_COMP=?,STR_REF_PRIMARY_APP_NO=?,DT_OF_FORW_TO_HE_ELEC=?,GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_APPLICATION_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE
UPDATE PISSRT_REP_MNT_LT_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_APPLICATION_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE

UPDATE PISSRT_REP_MNT_LT_TRN SET STR_COMP_ATTEND_BY=?, STR_STATUS_COMPLAINT=?, STR_ANY_REMARKS=?,STR_STATUS=?, GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_APPLICATION_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE
